Question:
Is it possible to interface the external SRAM to the RA0 series ?
Answer:
The RA0 series is the single chip microcontroller, it doesn't have an external bus interface. For this reason, it is not possible to connect external memory to the CPU's address and data bus.
Suitable Products
RA0E1
